h2_title: Emerald-Armed Mantis Boss Fight and Guide
content: Because the fight takes place inside Bajie's stomach, the area is limited. You'll find the mantis hacking and slashing away at the lining of Bajie's stomach, and it will soon turn its attention to you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Emerald-Armed_Mantis.md', within the main section titled 'Emerald-Armed Mantis', specifically from the subsection 'Emerald-Armed Mantis Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Because the fight takes place inside Bajie's stomach, the area is limited. You'll find the mantis hacking and slashing away at the lining of Bajie's stomach, and it will soon turn its attention to you.
